review: Tried to mirror my hdx screen to my hdtv. I see the display mirrored to my TV for a few seconds and it sputters, stops, and the connection is broken. I go to the Display & Sounds tab in Settings and try to re-establish connection and it hangs for a long time before telling me a connection could not be established with the Fire TV stick. Sometimes, I see the video without any issues on my hdx but the video on my TV is a series of pauses.Apart from the display mirroring issues, I use my roku more than the fire tv stick as the roku's user interface is better thought through.

review: After years of only having standard TV channels to watch, the fire stick opened up a great new world for us.  Lots of our favorite shows and movies without the commercials.  The stick installed simply and easily.  The downloads are fast seamless.  I do have to unplug it occasionally to "reboot"  because it will get stuck and won't play anything.  Not a problem!  Love, love, love, it!
